translation.techexplain:
The data from the canton of Bern gets parsed using python into a CSV file, which serves as data source for this application.
The frontend is react in combination with D3.js
translation.share_message: Hey, check out this website that I found!
translation.register_now: Register now and get notifications, when there are COVID-19 cases near you. Watch only communities and municipalities you are interested in.

translation.last_10_days: Anzahl Fälle in den letzten 10 Tagen
